metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Combines Sci-Fi mystery with a dark comedic tone, similar to Fallout and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Darkly comedic superhero show with action and social commentary akin to One-Punch Man and Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Complex sci-fi mystery with elements of drama and crime, fitting the mold of Stranger Things and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and satirical sci-fi themes, aligning with Love, Death & Robots and Futurama.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Intense drama with crime and mystery elements, appealing to fans of The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Dark comedy with crime elements, similar in tone to Brassic and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Critically acclaimed comedy with a unique and quirky style, like Scrubs and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Heartwarming and funny mockumentary-style comedy similar to Ted Lasso and Scrubs.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Smart and meta comedy with a cult following, reminiscent of Rick and Morty and The Simpsons.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with a unique premise, like Ted Lasso but with a more surreal twist.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with romantic elements, matching the humor of Futurama and the futuristic setting of Fallout.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Absurdist sci-fi comedy with mystery elements, similar to Rick and Morty but with a British sensibility.

metas.name: The Umbrella Academy
metas.description: Superhero series with a dysfunctional family and a focus on character drama, fitting with Stranger Things and Doctor Who.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi series with political intrigue and action, akin to Foundation.

metas.name: Babylon 5
metas.description: Classic sci-fi series with complex storylines and character development, appealing to fans of Foundation and Doctor Who.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Sci-fi thriller with espionage and alternate realities, in line with The Night Manager and Dark.

metas.name: Happy!
metas.description: Darkly comedic action series with absurd elements, echoing Rick and Morty and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi miniseries with strong performances and a unique visual style, like Love, Death & Robots but longer form.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: Dark comedy with a time loop premise, blending humor with existential themes, similarly to Rick and Morty.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: Surreal comedy-drama with social commentary and unique storytelling, echoing the style of Brassic and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy-drama with dark themes and complex characters, like Rick and Morty but with more introspection.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: Animated space opera with humor and heart, blending elements of Futurama and Ted Lasso.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero series with mature themes and brutal action, similar to One-Punch Man but with deeper character development.

metas.name: Star Trek: Lower Decks
metas.description: Animated comedy set in the Star Trek universe, blending sci-fi with humor, akin to Futurama.

metas.name: The Orville
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy-drama that pays homage to Star Trek, balancing humor with serious themes, like Doctor Who.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: Dark comedy-drama about grief and finding hope, similar to Ted Lasso but with a darker tone.

metas.name: Catastrophe
metas.description: Sharp and honest comedy about modern relationships, like Scrubs but with a more cynical edge.

metas.name: Detectorists
metas.description: Gentle and quirky comedy-drama about metal detecting, offering a different kind of humor from It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia but with a similar offbeat charm.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: Witty and poignant comedy-drama with a strong female lead, similar to Ted Lasso but with a more cynical and complex character.

metas.name: Murderville
metas.description: Improv comedy with celebrity guests solving crimes, blending humor with mystery, appealing to fans of crime procedurals and comedy.

metas.name: Only Murders in the Building
metas.description: Comedy-mystery series with engaging characters and a compelling plot, fitting with All Her Fault and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Poker Face
metas.description: Mystery series with a compelling lead and unique case-of-the-week format, appealing to fans of crime procedurals.

metas.name: Bosch
metas.description: Gritty crime drama with a compelling lead and complex storylines, similar to HIS & HERS and The Night Manager.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: Intense police procedural with twists and turns, fitting with crime dramas like The Night Manager.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: Thriller with political intrigue and suspense, appealing to fans of The Night Manager and HIS & HERS.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: Dark and intense crime drama with a charismatic lead, similar to Bosch and other crime series watched.

metas.name: Broadchurch
metas.description: Emotional crime drama with strong performances and a compelling mystery, fitting with All Her Fault.

metas.name: Happy Valley
metas.description: Gritty crime drama with a strong female lead and complex characters, like Brassic but more serious.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on the classic detective with compelling mysteries and strong performances, aligning with the mystery and crime genres watched.

metas.name: The Wire
metas.description: Critically acclaimed crime drama with a realistic portrayal of urban life, appealing to fans of serious crime dramas.
